channel.title: I can't count past three :( HELP!
channel.description:
Sorry about the weird name but I figured it would capture people's attention more.
I was wondering if there was a way to change the value of buttons and such clicked in runescape.
For example if you click the close button in an interface or a spell in your spell book, prayers ect. I'm trying to fix the crafting interface on my server. Thanks!

item.title: I can't count past three :( HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:481620”][quote author=Ike TeeHee link=topic=599858.msg4215164#msg4215164 date=1360160977]

public class Count { public static void main(String args[]) { for(int i = 0; i <= 4; i++) { System.out.println(i); } } }

IT WORKS

That has nothing to do with my server, but thanks for trying.
[/quote]
It counts to 3. Just like the thread titles says you can’t.
100% related.[/quote]

4* ._.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't count past three :( HELP!

item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

Pink Phat:

Thread titles are not meant to draw attention. They are meant to give a brief overview of what the thread is about.

Ya but when i do that no one helps.

xxx123xxx:

Oh, you mean actionbuttons?

Probably, action buttons sounds about right. How can i change the values.

Also if there is a way to change what options pop up when you right click something, that would be great to learn aswell
